entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
